mapper.select: SELECT ACCESS FROM AUTHORITY WHERE USERID = #{userid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RATE (STARPOINT, USERID, ccbaKdcd, ccbaAsno, ccbaCtcd) VALUES (#{starpoint}, #{userid}, #{ccbaKdcd}, #{ccbaAsno}, #{ccbaCtcd});
mapper.select: SELECT H.CCBAMNM1, H.CCBAASNO, H.COMMENT, H.COMMENTDATE, R.STARPOINT FROM HERITAGEREVIEW H JOIN RATE R ON H.USERID = R.USERID AND H.CCBAASNO = R.CCBAASNO AND H.CCBAKDCD = R.CCBAKDCD AND H.CCBACTCD = R.CCBACTCD WHERE H.USERID = #{userid} ORDER BY H.COMMENTDATE DESC;
